name: The Time Orb
description:
A Little Story:

Player is a lost robot tank in the desert. Then accidently it founds a castle which its roof isn’t visible. By triggering the time orb in the castle, player got a curse and sent to a dungeon which contains various puzzles. Player’s main goal is finding exit from this dungeon by solving the puzzles.

How to play:

While you holding mouse left click, green lines appers to show where your villian going to be spawned. And with right click you will see a  blue line for showing which tank’s body going to be switched with player.
In puzzle you will have to spawn villian who clone of yourself to proper possion or control them to solve puzzle.

After triggering the time orb, there will be a shining scene in the castle then player teleport to the dungeon and  gameplay starts.
In the dungeon there are tables to teach elements and objects to player. These elements are sphere rock, crate, TNT, teleportation, using of freecam, controlling enemy

Controls:

WASD  = movement

Mouse = Camera movement

Shift = faster speed

Mouse left = spawning villian

Mouse right = changing body with a villian tank

Mouse scroll = changing zoom

F =  Freecam 

R= Respawn

Ctrl and space while Freecam is on=  Decreasing increasing height

P = Quit Game

I made the game for a university assignment with unity3d in a week.
